title: The Witch, the Cat and the Egg
description: Juliane is a young witch who lives on the edge of a magical forest. She knows its secrets and the magical creatures that live there. Both the kingâ€™s knights and peasant travellers seek her help to guide them through the forest. One day, in a vision, Juliane is shown a very large egg. She has no idea what the vision means. As the day unfolds, her cat Magicus will lead her to a place where the mystery of the vision is revealed. Juliane will need to call on a few of her magical forest friends to help her fulfill a very important promise.
author: Joanne Lecuyer
